pyrimidine package¶

pyrimidine is a competitive framework for genetic algorithms

Subpackages

  • pyrimidine.benchmarks subpackage
    • pyrimidine.benchmarks.approximation module

    • pyrimidine.learn.linear_regression module

    • pyrimidine.learn.cluster module
  • pyrimidine.local_search subpackage

    • pyrimidine.local_search.tabu_search module
  • pyrimidine.misc subpackage
    • pyrimidine.misc.aco module
    • pyrimidine.misc.ba module
    • pyrimidine.misc.fa module
    • pyrimidine.misc.gsa module
    • pyrimidine.misc.sma module
